resources.string: Allow app to track your data in order to improve health algorithm.

In order to check or predict your potential health condition, the machine learning algorithm uses data such as: age, weight, height, gender, whether you smoke, number of steps, time spent on the phone, detected smiles in pictures, the ratio of the number of sent and received messages, as well as outgoing and incoming calls.
Check if you have a potential problem
Predict your health condition and detect a potential problem based on today\'s data
Predict your health condition and detect a potential problem based on weekly data
Machine learning algorithm has classified your health condition as dangerous
Machine learning algorithm has classified your health condition as non dangerous. To get more information try to predict your health condition on previous screen.
